author: SciShow
description:
Go to http://complexlylearnathon.com to check out the Learnathon schedule and support our cool stuff!

They may not be our favorite thing to think about, but viruses have shaped our lives for thousands of years. In this SciShow compilation, we explore the most surprising things about them—including the debate over whether they're even alive.

Hosted by: Reid Reimers
----------
Support us for $8/month on Patreon and keep SciShow going!

title: Everything You Didn't Want to Know About Viruses | Compilation
